message.content: {"given_definition_quality":42,"better_definition":"she; her (refers to a woman or girl)","sentence":"她在学校。","image_prompt":"Show an Asian girl wearing a simple outfit, standing in front of a plain school building, carrying a school bag on her shoulder. The image should have a soft apocalypse animation style, with gentle pastel colors and slight surreal lighting that hints at a peaceful, dreamlike world. The mood is calm and optimistic.","sentence_translation":"She is at school."}
